short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to access Google Tutorials from the Techy Coach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension connects you with Google Tutorials from the Techy Coach.  Access tutorials for the Google products you need, when you need them.
